function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of training and network-related capital in inter-agency governance","Impact":"Inability to effectively implement inter-disciplinary teams and innovative responses to public health crises","Mitigation":"Provide training and foster network development among agencies to enhance collaboration and response capabilities","Technologies":"Networking technologies, training platforms","People":"Managers, public health officials","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Leadership-dependent effectiveness in dedicated management governance","Impact":"Ineffective management and utilization of resources in urban and metropolitan parks","Mitigation":"Implement leadership development programs and performance evaluation systems","Technologies":"Leadership assessment tools, management software","People":"Park managers, government officials","Owner":"Park management organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of citizen participation in pandemic response","Impact":"Limited community engagement and stakeholder involvement in public health measures","Mitigation":"Develop outreach and engagement strategies, incentivize participation","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, communication tools","People":"Neighborhood residents, non-state actors","Owner":"Local government, community organizations"}]}
